document.full_text: cuba will consider placing term limits on its leaders to assure new blood in the goverment, president raul castro said on saturday in a speech kicking off a communist party congress on the island he and his brother led for more than five decades.
document.title: cuba to consider term limits for leaders: castro
lines_and_colors: cuba will consider placing term limits on its leaders to assure new blood in the goverment, president raul castro said on saturday in a speech kicking off a communist party congress on the island he and his brother led for more than five decades.
